KnowledgeBase.Title: Example Directory compareLE 005
KnowledgeBase.RelatedFunctions: compare compareEQ compareNE compareGE compareLT compareGT

Example.Description: These examples use the compareLE function to compare two Directories and return the Boolean value, true or false. The corresponding keys and values of each Directory are compared to determine whether one Directory is lesser than or equal to the other.

Syntax.Note: The first Directory is lesser than the second Directory.
